org.mini2Dx.core.di

Interface ComponentScanner

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AndroidComponentScanner, DesktopComponentScanner, IOSComponentScanner

    public interface ComponentScanner
    A common interface to component scanning implementations. Scans packages for classes annotated with Singleton and Prototype

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getPrototypeClasses() 
      java.util.List<java.lang.Class<?>> getSingletonClasses() 
      void scan(java.lang.String[] packageNames)
      Scans multiple packages recursively for Singleton and Prototype annotated classes

    • Method Detail

      • scan

        void scan(java.lang.String[] packageNames)
          throws java.io.IOException,
                 java.lang.NullPointerException,
                 java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Scans multiple packages recursively for Singleton and Prototype annotated classes
        Parameters:
        packageNames - The package name to scan through, e.g. org.mini2Dx.component
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
        java.lang.NullPointerException
